proposedChanges.value: Include a concise subheadline highlighting 'hand it off without losing control'.
proposedChanges.rationale: Clarifies main promise and value proposition.

proposedChanges.value: Ensure the hero CTA button is prominent and centered.
proposedChanges.rationale: Increases visibility and encourages immediate action.

proposedChanges.value: Simplify pricing tables with clear headings and concise benefits.
proposedChanges.rationale: Reduces cognitive load and improves scannability.

proposedChanges.value: Integrate customer testimonials with verified badges.
proposedChanges.rationale: Enhances trust and credibility through social proof.

proposedChanges.value: Place the solution section immediately after the problem section.
proposedChanges.rationale: Creates a logical flow and improves narrative coherence.
risks: Section transition might be too abrupt

proposedChanges.value: Implement a sticky CTA button at the bottom of the page.
proposedChanges.rationale: Ensures constant access to conversion point.

proposedChanges.value: Display a security badge near CTA buttons.
proposedChanges.rationale: Reinforces safety and security of the platform.

proposedChanges.value: Ensure hero image and text stack vertically on mobile.
proposedChanges.rationale: Improves readability and engagement on smaller screens.

assumptions: Users are seeking clarity and trust in business operations
